title: Turned
description: From the national bestselling author of Tainted/I> and Torn .Three consecutive months-three explosive novels of The Blood Lily Chronicles.When Lily Carlyle died in an act of vengeance, she came back as an assassin for the light. But when she discovered her masters' true darkness, she decided to choose the right side for once...Her own.With her cover as a double agent inside the forces of evil blown, Lily has no choice but to go underground. She takes along a cadre of humans, angels, demons, and other trusted creatures. Their only hope is to stop the forces who are attempting to use the Ninth gate as a wedge that will unleash the fury of Hell.
author: Julie Kenner
